Text:
Hi Keeybee,

Thanks for the cool 4 Seasons upload. We love FLAC oldies out here in cyber land.  

What label/version/year is this cd?  I couldn't match it up on Amazon USA or Amazon UK?

Thanks,

BT

Frankie Valli & The Four Seasons
20 Greatest Hits - 1988

http://allmusic.com/cg/amg.dll?p=amg&sql=10:k9fuxquhldke


Amazon listing only has this in Vinyl

Hi Dawg,

Thanks for the info.  Nice sound on this set - mono and stereo.

BT

I've added this info to the torrent description

P & C Prism Leisure 1989, Made in Germany
Platinum Music, PLAT CD 4902

Thank you keeybee for this share. This cd has particular sentimental importance to me. I am very glad to have found it here on tpb.
Much up's for the up, kb!
